blocks.title: Revolutionize Forms with Repeatable Fields
blocks.content: The repeater field lets visitors duplicate fields with a click. It's perfect for job applications, registrations, and so much more. Make your forms more flexible and collect all the information you need.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/wpforms-lite-upgrade/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Repeater Field Upgrade to Pro Lite

blocks.title: Build Smarter Forms Faster
blocks.content: Apply conditional logic to a group of fields using the updated Layout field, saving you time when creating your forms.

blocks.title: Style Forms Without Writing Code
blocks.content: Styling your forms just got easier. Choose a pre-designed theme for your forms or build your own custom color combination. Now you can change your label, button, and field styles and instantly see results in real-time.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/docs/styling-your-forms/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Form Styles v2 Try It Out Lite

blocks.title: Style Forms Without Writing Code
blocks.content: Styling your forms just got easier. Choose a pre-designed theme for your forms or build your own custom color combination. Try the new background picker and see a real-time preview of your finished form.
